text:
For it is on your account I bear insult,that disgrace covers my face. I have become an outcast to my kindred,a stranger to my mother’s children. Because zeal for your house has consumed me,I am scorned by those who scorn you.

Psalms 69:8-10

Remembering my dad today who taught me that in every moment of my life, I should always strive to live my boldest truth possible. To all of the dads and father-figures making a positive difference in the life of a child, wishing you a very happy #FathersDay. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbCigoPWsAMpb6Z.png

Happy Father’s Day to all the fathers and father-figures across our nation. And to my husband, best friend, and biggest supporter @douglasemhoff—you are a wonderful father to Ella and Cole and we’re so lucky to have you in our lives. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbChR6AWsAA7Bd3.jpg

RT @MrMikeBlake It's #GOTV time! 4 Days to Bring this Home!

I thank you for your support and I ask you for your vote.

My name is Michael Blake and I am running for Congress #ny15

Let's Get it!  #BelieveInTheBX #BELIEVE http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1274328744673652737/pu/img/CaqjXNnEoc4G9z5z.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1274328744673652737/pu/vid/476x270/IBve8zLi-8TltXdf.mp4?tag=10

Wishing you all a Happy #FathersDay! May you all find time to celebrate with your family & loved ones. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbCzslKXgAA1eWz.jpg

Trump is ethically unfit, intellectually unprepared and personally unqualified to be President of the United States.

We must vote him out.

My Dad has been my hero my whole life. To all the Dads out there, thank you for all you do... #HappyFathersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbCxzOyX0AIcHZ6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1274712919587028993/vid/480x270/KRFJuqso57HpBRc4.mp4?tag=13

I'm looking back on the fond memories of my dad today and reflecting on the lasting lessons he passed on to me. He taught me to always live my boldest truth possible. I strive every day to live up to his sense of service, good humor, and kindness. #FathersDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbCsXyiXQAAwqte.jpg

Thinking about George Floyd this Father's Day and all the fathers who have lost their lives to police violence. They should be celebrating their fatherhood today. Holding their children and families in my heart on what is surely a difficult day.

Today I’m thinking of all the fathers who can’t be with their children to celebrate Father’s Day. The fathers working an extra shift to help save coronavirus patients. The fathers who are deployed. The fathers in jail simply because they can’t afford to make bail.
Senator McConnell must stop obstructing the #HeroesAct and the life-saving testing resources it provides. #FamiliesFirst

Testing, tracing, treatment & social distancing are the only tools we have to stop the spread of the coronavirus. The President’s efforts to slow down testing to hide the true extent of the virus means more Americans will lose their lives.  https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/62120

Trump had a bad night in Tulsa. Very low turnout. Even his supporters know that COVID-19 is real and dangerous, and should not be spread at an indoor rally. More importantly, maybe people are catching on that he is a pathological liar and a fraud. Let's keep fighting.
Wishing dads everywhere a #HappyFathersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbDLqMHWkAEQN2O.jpg

My daddy is gone, but I want to wish him a Happy Father’s Day. And Happy Father’s Day to all the fathers and father figures working their hardest to support their kids and set a positive example they can look up to.
Whatever I did, my daddy believed in me. He’d say, “That’s my Betsy.” http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbDc8MVWAAAv-O5.jpg
Happy Father’s Day to my dad, @RonPaul and to all the fathers doing their best to raise their families. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbDjbxHWoAEK4FG.jpg

Washington, D.C. has over 700,000 residents—more than Wyoming or Vermont—and its residents pay federal taxes. But they don’t get an equal voice in our government. It’s time for D.C. statehood. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/dc-statehood-vote-house-of-representatives-next-week/

Juneteenth may have passed but the work continues to recognize it as a federal holiday. Our new bill would honor it with the respect it deserves and ensure every American remembers the millions who suffered, died and survived the crushing reality of slavery in America.

Republicans have been fighting the Affordable Care Act from the moment it became law. And now they’re trying to overturn it during a global pandemic. It’s utterly heartless. 
https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/17/opinions/protect-americans-health-care-from-trump-harris/index.html

Rising temperatures and air pollution are causing more babies to be born premature, underweight, or stillborn—and Black moms are much more likely to face these dangers than white moms. We need to center environmental racism in our fight against climate change. https://twitter.com/publicintegrity/status/1274024141847269377 QT @publicintegrity Pregnant women exposed to high temperatures or air pollution are more likely to have children who are premature, underweight or stillborn. And African-American mothers and babies are harmed at a much higher rate. (via @nytimes)
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/06/18/climate/climate-change-pregnancy-study.html

Jane and I want to take this opportunity to wish all the fathers in our country a Happy Father's Day. There is nothing more important than giving our kids the love and support they need.
Having a great Father’s Day celebrating with ⁦@RonPaul⁩! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbEAyBRXkAA2ucy.jpg

RT @ClintSmithIII Father's Day is a good day to remind people that all phone calls and video calls for incarcerated people should be free in every prison and jail across the country. Not just during a pandemic, not just during holidays, not as a special privilege. But for everyone, all year round.
@tedlieu 🏆🏆🏆

If he wins,  McConnell loses. Can you please send some money? Thank you so much.  https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tjojunepolls

Don’t think I’ve ever retweeted Krugman. He’s right. https://twitter.com/paulkrugman/status/1274437641501581319 QT @paulkrugman As it happens, here's the book I started reading a few days ago. I've long been a Grant groupie; he was imperfect, but without him there would have been no emancipation — and he fought the Klan. Leave his statues alone! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ea-2OkZWoAEP01C.jpg
@kendallybrown Hey! I apologize for the harm and thank you for stepping up to point it out. Taking it down & always open to engaging further. 💜

The people who have been marching in the streets for weeks do not want watered down legislation that won’t even hold police accountable. We need real, meaningful reform.

Our Justice in Policing Act would provide that.

6200. That could have been a Zoom meeting. 

Same energy, minus the #coronavirus risk. https://twitter.com/jemillerwbal/status/1274659135724949508 QT @jemillerwbal Tulsa arena where Trump held his campaign rally holds 19,200.

The fact that law enforcement is using tear gas on protestors in the middle of a pandemic is outrageous. My colleagues and I are calling for agencies to cease these tacts to prevent the increased risk of coronavirus transmission and unnecessary hospitalizations.

Their ignorance knows no bounds. And, apparently, they hate Hispanics. https://twitter.com/stillgray/status/1274351664871301120 QT @stillgray Why is Antifa targeting Cervantes? Cervantes, the author of Don Quixote, was himself a slave. He wrote extensively about his life among Christian slaves in Algiers in his play Trato de Argel. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ea9nrfgU0AEzhry.jpg

Nobody out-wokes the NFL. 

Whenever they return to play, Kaepernick will be back, playing somewhere. And any defender who sacks him will be branded a hater & immediately fined by the league. https://twitter.com/breitbartnews/status/1274730275222716423 QT @BreitbartNews Brett Favre believes Colin Kaepernick, like Army Ranger Pat Tillman, will be thought of as a “hero.” https://trib.al/b0yjmLV

Qué día el de ayer.

Mientras caminaba hacia mi sitio de votación, me di cuenta que era el Centro Comunitario Sonia Sotomayor.

Cuando fue nombrada la primera latina en SCOTUS, una Boricua del Bronx, me hizo sentir que si hay un lugar para mí en el mundo. https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1274463389331439617 QT @AOC What a day.

As I walked to my early voting site, I realized it was the Sonia Sotomayor Community Center.

When she was named 1st Latina to the SCOTUS, a Bronx Boricua, it made a younger me feel like there was a place for me in the world.

Today I cast my ballot under her name 😭 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ea_NshHWsAISVIT.jpg

Para todos los papás + figuras paternas,
del pasado, presente y futuro -

Tu amor, atención y cuidado mueven montañas y cambian el mundo. ¡Gracias!

Mi papá creyó en mí, me entrenó y me retó. No sería quién soy ahora sin el regalo de su amor.

Feliz día del padre 💙 https://twitter.com/AOC/status/1274783899718205440 QT @AOC To all dads + father figures,
past, present, and future -

Your love, attention, and care moves mountains and changes the world. Thank you!

My papá believed in me, coached me, and challenged me. I wouldn’t be me without having had the gift of his love.

Happy Father’s Day 💙 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbDxMunWAAEiQE0.jpg

Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) @AOC
